title: Reducing Hallucinations of Medical Multimodal Large Language Models with Visual Retrieval-Augmented Generation
details: YW Chu, K Zhang, C Malon, MR Min - arXiv preprint arXiv:2502.15040, 2025
abstract: Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) have shown impressive performance in vision and text tasks. However, hallucination remains a major challenge, especially in fields like healthcare where details are critical. In this work, we show …
